about
Lemon Tree Premier, Dwarka is a 4-star property set in Dwarka. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk.

All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Lemon Tree Premier, Dwarka have a city view. The units feature a safety deposit box.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast.

Dwarkadhish Temple is less than 1 km from Lemon Tree Premier, Dwarka. The nearest airport is Porbandar Airport, 105 km from the hotel.
